Methods

WithMainWindow<TView>(IServiceProvider)

Configures the application to display the specified main window upon startup. The DataContext of the window will be automatically set to the ViewModel that's registered for the provided view type.

public static IServiceProvider WithMainWindow<TView>(this IServiceProvider serviceProvider) where TView : Window

Parameters

serviceProvider IServiceProvider

The service provider that holds registrations for the application's services.

Returns

IServiceProvider

The original service provider to allow for method chaining.

Type Parameters

TView

The type of the main window that should be displayed. This type must derive from Window.

Remarks

This method is typically called during application startup, after the service provider has been configured with all required services. It ensures that the main window of the application is displayed, and that its data context is correctly set up.
